title: Electoral Process (Local Government Elections) (Election Date and Time of Poll) (No. 2) Order, 2021
content:
16th July, 2021 Statutory Instruments 623
GOVERNMENT OF ZAMBIA
Statutory Instrument No. 68 of 2021
The Electoral Process Act, 2016
(Act No. 35 of 2016)
The Electoral Process (Local Government Elections)
(Election Date and Time of Poll) (No. 2) Order, 2021
In exercise of the powers contained in section 125 of the Electoral
Process Act, 2016, the following Order is made:
1. This Order may be cited as the Electoral Process (Local Title
Government Elections) (Election Date and Time of Poll) (No.2)
Order, 2021.
2. A candidate for election as mayor or councillor in a district Date and
time of
and ward set out in the Schedule shall lodge a nomination with the
nomination
returning officer on Monday, 12th July, 2021, between 0900 hours for election
and 1500 hours.
3. The campaign period shall commence on Monday, 12th July, Campaign
2021, at 1500 hours and close at 1800 hours on Wednesday, 11th period
August, 2021.
4. (1) The poll for the election of a mayor or councilor in a Election date
district and ward set out in the Schedule shall take place on Thursday, and time of
poll
12th August, 2021, between 0600 hours and 1800 hours.
(2) A poll shall not be taken in a district or ward if only one
candidate is validly nominated.
Copies of this Statutory Instrument can be obtainedfrom the Government Printer,
P.O. Box30136,10101, Lusaka, Price K4.00 each
